snippet: Egypt was the second-worst jailer, according to the Committee to Protect Journalists, which said 199 journalists around the world were in prison.
abstract: Committee to Protect Journalists says China jailed more journalists in 2015 than any other country; surge in amount of journalists imprisoned in Egypt is attributed to policies of new president Abdel Fattah el-Sisi.
lead_paragraph: Egypt was the second-worst jailer, according to the Committee to Protect Journalists, which said 199 journalists around the world were in prison.

headline.main: China Is Leading Jailer of Journalists, Group Says
headline.print_headline: China Is Leading Jailer of Journalists, Group Says
